TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the scout steal it

I wish that people were understanding the full meaning of the word "Cupcake"

Granted, but then they take it to seriously.

I wish for Bo!nk Atomic Punch.

Granted, it's carcinogenic

I wish to have some muffins

Granted, but their raisin muffins

I wish for something to do.

Granted. You try to rob a bank and get arrested.

I wish for sleep.

Granted, you fall into a coma

I wish for a giant plane like this:

Granted, the recoil of the cannon make it crash.

I wish for physic-friendly craft.

granted, but it still crashes.

I wish i would get off the forum and do my homework already.

Granted, you forget most of the information

I wish for some recognition

Granted. You get swarmed by people whenever they see you.

I wish bronies would keep their stuff off of this forum.

Granted, the furries take over the forum

I wish people to keep of bringing the subject up (more you talk about it, more bronies get hype)

Edited November 3, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Were you not a half-brony the last time I checked?

Granted. The internet gets shut down, so now no-one remembers it.

I wish Pokemon was still a thing as much as it was a couple decades ago.

The fandom is dying?

Granted, people are more hype on pokemon that they we're already and it become the new internet buzz.

I wish that the fun was doubled

Granted, but it drives people to overwork and die.

I wish that I understood why everyone is going ape shet over ponies.

Granted, you slap yourself in the face now that you get it.

I wish I had a cookie.

Granted, but its made of insects

I wish It all made sense to me.

Nobody knows! We're all sheep, trying to understand the strange phenomena of the FIM outbreak

Granted, now you leave the fandom 'cuz it's ridiculous

I wish to have a mathematical shematic of this Internet buzz

Granted, but it explodes your head

i wish me and mrpample could team up to figure it out(and i really mean this too)

Granted, we team up but we don't know how to do it

(If you want to team up, go see the documentary that I sent to you, knowing the past can predict the futur!)

I wish to play Phoenix Wright

Granted. You suck at it.

I wish I had a Felipe with me.

Granted, It's a wierd Felipe

I wish for Dragon Balls capsules system

Granted, full of dragons who wish to murder you.

I wish to have a pilot's licence!

Granted, the first plane you fly crashes and burns.

I Wish for a Pilot's licence that won't kill me.

Granted, You kill someone else (crash landing) and are sentenced to a lifetime of prison.

I wish for a holy pilot's licence that protects me from anything bad ever happening to me.

Anything.

Granted, suddenly everything, not anything, bad happens to you resulting in the death of yourself and everyone around you in a ten mile radius

i wish for cybernetic nanites that i can control through wet wired circuits in my brain

Edit: whoops forgot the granted

Edited November 4, 2013 by Helix935
